description:
Bass Edge's THE EDGE is a bi-monthly podcast that focuses on techniques, tips, and inside product knowledge that will help improve your
	    fishing success.  Each month we interview a different top pro angler and focus on a bait or technique in which they specialize.  We also interview a product expert who provides in depth information on a particular product or service that may effect your success on the water.  This audio program is a compliment to our technique focused web-site located at bassedge.com.  For more information on our instructional DVDs, books, and other Bass Edge products please visit us online at bassedge.com.
title: Bass Edge's THE EDGE

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge- Episode 339 Timmy Klinger
episodes.description: Bass Edge Radio, presented by Megaware KeelGuard features 2020 WON Bass US Open Champion Timmy Klinger in this episode of their top-rated podcast. Bass Edge hosts Aaron Martin and Kurt Dove discuss with Timmy his winning strategy and fall fishing from the West to the East!

episodes.description: Bass Edge Radio interviews Major League Fishing Pro Angler Ish Monroe as the featured pro in the latest podcast presented by Megaware KeelGuard. Show hosts Aaron Martin and Kurt Dove visit with Ish about his huge margin of victory at the FLW Toyota Series on the California Delta and breakdown his thoughts on Flipping and Frogging during the fall.

Wood.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 157 - Cliff Pace
episodes.description: Your 2013 BassMaster Classic Champion, Cliff Pace is at the mic covering his go-to spring techniques and his passion for "tackle-tinkering".  Plus Aaron & Kurt award 2 lucky listeners $125 worth of O'Reilly Auto Parts gift-cards.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 156 - Billy McDonald
episodes.description: Billy McDonald shares where to concentrate efforts this time of year as well as tech tips that are sure to save you money, increase performance and the longevity of your motors and autos. Also, the winners are announced and listener questions answered.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 155 - Pete Ponds
episodes.description:
Pete Ponds covers spring cranking including bait selection, line choice and bait wobble. Plus, Aaron & Kurt
announce a bonus in addition to the $100 giveaway.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 154 - Jeff Kriet
episodes.description:
Jeff Kriet tackles bass migration and finesse fishing on this episode of Bass Edge Radio presented by MegaWare
KeelGuard.  A lucky listener will be awarded $100 gift-card to O'sReilly Auto Parts for having their question chosen and answered on-air.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 153 - Chad Morgenthaler
episodes.description:
Chad Morgenthaler joins hosts Aaron Martin & Kurt Dove to discuss pre-spawning bass and fishing vegetation on
the latest episode of Bass Edge Radio presented by Megaware KeelGuard.  Also, Fans have numerous chances to win $100 OReilly Auto Parts gift-cards, Lucas Oil
Marine products and  $500 complete boat protection packages from MegaWare KeelGuard.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 152 - Fred "Boom Boom" Roumbanis
episodes.description:
Fred "Boom Boom" Roumbanis brings the thunder discussing electronics & swimbaits on the latest episode of Bass
Edge Radio, presented by KeelGuard.  Also, Aaron and Kurt award a lucky listener $100 gift-card.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 151 - Travis Rulle & 2013 Season Preview
episodes.description:
Travis Rulle joins the crew to discuss fishing pressured waters.  Aaron and Kurt launch the 2013 season with an
all new format and major announcements.  Plus, Bass Edge Nation is provided with even more opportunities to cash-in on some great prizes.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 150 - Kevin Hawk and Bryan Thrift
episodes.description: Anglers Kevin Hawk and Bryan Thrift join Aaron and Kurt to discuss December fishing and preparing for 2013.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 149 - David Walker & Marcus Sykora
episodes.description: David Walker & Marcus Sykora talk cold-fronts, spotted bass and jerk-baiting with  Aaron and Kurt on Bass Edge! Plus a listener question is answered and the winners for the KeelGuard giveaway are chosen.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 148 - David Dudley and Brent Chapman
episodes.description: Anglers of The Year David Dudley and Brent Chapman share their secrets on consistency regardless of the season or condition. Plus, Aaron & Kurt field a listener question and tell you how to qualify for the $500 KeelGuard giveaway.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 147 - Jacob Wheeler and Scott Canterbury
episodes.description: Jacob Wheeler and Scott Canterbury join the Bass Edge crew to discuss bream beds, deep fishing and how to approach September fishing.  Also, Aaron and Kurt unveil the $500 giveaway from KeelGuard and how to enter.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 146 - Jonathon VanDam and Josh Wagy
episodes.description: Jonathon VanDam and Josh Wagy stop by The Edge to visit with Aaron and Kurt concerning their recent victories and qualifications into the 2013 BassMasters Classic.  JVD shares his knowledge on fishing smallmouth in the North Country and Josh weighs-in on fishing tidal waters out East. Plus, listener questions are answered and prizes awarded.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 145 - Dave Lefebre and Kurt Dove
episodes.description: Dave LeFebre visits The Edge to talk summertime fishing and recap his most recent tour win on Kentucky Lake. Also, Kurt Dove weighs in on a listener question and Aaron & Steve make a surprise announcement.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 144 - Scott Martin and Brian Maloney
episodes.description: FLW Touring Pro Scott Martin and BFL All-American Champion Brian Maloney join the Bass Edge crew fresh off their Potomac River victories. Both anglers break down their winning patterns and the preparation required for success on the water.  Also, two lucky listeners have their questions answered on air.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 143 - Brent Ehrler and Pam Martin-Wells
episodes.description: Red-hot FLW angler Brent Ehrler joins Aaron and Steve to discuss keys to consistency and his favorite topwater techniques. And then the all-time womens money leader, Pam Martin-Wells, joins the conversation to discuss fishing vegetation and the importance of a strong work ethic.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 142 - Chris Lane and Randy Howell
episodes.description: Fresh off his Bassmaster Classic victory, Chris Lane joins Aaron and Steve to talk about how he won bass fishings biggest prize. And Elite pro Randy Howell is back, talking about finding and catching pre-spawn bass, and selecting the right bait color for a given situation.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 141 - Kevin VanDam and Dr. Jay McNamara
episodes.description: Kevin VanDam touches on subjects from fishing high, stained water, to preparing for a career in professional bass fishing.  The March show will also feature longtime friend and colleague of the guys, Dr. Jay McNamara. “Dr. Fish” is a sports psychologist and author of “The Psychology of Exceptional Fishing".

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 140 - Mike Iaconelli and Joe Mitchell
episodes.description: Mike Iaconelli pays the Bass Edge crew a visit, sharing his insight on fishing rivers and the pre-spawn. Louisiana angler Joe Mitchell joins the conversation with his take on his home waters, The Red River, with predictions for the 2012 Bassmaster Classic. Bass Tackle Depots Fil Torres brings us up to date on the latest in tackle trends and looks back at some traditional baits. As always, listener questions are answered and gift certificates are awarded to basstackledepot.com

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 139 - Dave Wolak and Ish Monroe
episodes.description: Bass Edge boys are back:  January 2012 finds Aaron & Steve talking bass fishing with the countries favorite personalities Dave Wolak and Ish Monroe.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - An all new season begins January 2012
episodes.description: An all new season of The Edge begins in January 2012

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 138 - Mark Zona and Mark Jones
episodes.description: Aaron Martin & Steve Brigman clock the longest Edge episode ever with an abundance of fishing tips, listener questions, and tournament info. Bassmaster & World's Greatest Fishing Show Host Mark Zona returns. Mark Jones covers the Oakley Big Bass Tour.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 137 -Skeet Reese & Fishing Tackle Forum
episodes.description: Hosts Aaron and Steve provide tips on post spawn fishing. BASS Elite Angler Skeet Reese discusses swimbait selection and secrets.  We answer a listener question on choosing their first boat. Brian Wright with Fishing Tackle Forum on finding unique tackle.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 136 - Brent Ehrler & Mark Jones
episodes.description: Winner of two recent FLW Tournaments, Pro  Angler Brent Ehrler visits The Edge crew with tips on spring fishing.  Mark Jones with the Oakley Big Bass Tour returns with the latest information on upcoming tour dates. Aaron & Steve answer a reel question.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 135 - Chad Morgenthaler & Listener Questions
episodes.description: Hosts Aaron Martin and Steve Brigman answer a range of listener questions and discuss what to watch for as March approaches and the fishing season kicks off.  Pro angler Chad Morgenthaler returns with info on fishing in the cold and prepping for spring.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 134 - Chris Lane
episodes.description: Elite Angler Chris Lane returns to discuss how he adapted to brutally cold weather during his recent win on Okeechobee. Hosts Aaron and Steve answer a question on power plant lakes and discuss the upcoming Eastern Sports and Outdoor Show in Harrisburg PA.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 133 - Mike McClelland & Dave Wolak
episodes.description: The Edge hosts Aaron Martin and Steve Brigman wrap up 2009 in style featuring an in depth interview with Elite Angler Mike McClelland on jerk baits and football jigs during the winter months.  Then Edge favorite Dave Wolak helps answer listener questions.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 132 - Darrel Robertson & Angler Gift Ideas
episodes.description: Bass Edge returns from a holiday break to discuss Thanksgiving, fishing cooling waters, and holiday gifts for any angler.  FLW veteran and avid hunter Darrel Robertson visits The Edge with thoughts on the economy and tips on December bass behavior.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 131 - Mark Lassagne
episodes.description: Hosts Aaron Martin and Steve Brigman discuss perseverance in fishing.  Angler, guide, and magazine publisher Mark Lassagne joins us from Northern California with insight on fishing falling water. We answer a listener question on fishing in Mexico.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 130 - Dave Lefebre
episodes.description: Toyota Texas Bass Classic Champion Dave Lefebre visits The Edge to discuss mechanics and shallow water fishing. Hosts Aaron and Steve talk about Halloween costume ideas and fishing in ever changing weather. We answer a question on soft plastics storage.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 129 - James Niggemeyer
episodes.description: Hosts Aaron and Steve discuss fishing in rain and muddy water.  B.A.S.S. Elite Angler James Niggemeyer returns with tips on handling rising water levels.  We answer a listener question on finding a job in the fishing industry and give away prizes.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 128 - Tom Mann Jr and Major Cody Roberson
episodes.description: Aaron  & Steve talk tough fishing in changing weather & when to peg worms. FLW Angler of the Year Tom Mann Jr returns with info on how to find fish. We answer a question on fishing jigs skirtless.  Major Roberson provides an update on Army Bass Anglers.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 127 - Gary Dobyns & Dobyns Rods
episodes.description: This week we get a double dose of U.S. Open Champion Gary Dobyns!  Gary starts by discussing fishing in the west and returns later as owner of Dobyns Rods to focus on rod selection tips. Hosts Aaron & Steve also answer questions and give away prizes.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 126 - Johnathon VanDam
episodes.description: Hosts Aaron Martin and  Steve Brigman head to the Pond Boss 3 Conference at Big Cedar Lodge and discuss the rainy week. Season 3 cohost Johnathon VanDam covers differences in fishing North and South. We answer a question regarding some boat buying tips.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 125 - Gabe Bolivar
episodes.description: Aaron Martin & Steve Brigman are excited about fall fishing. FLW Angler Gabe Bolivar covers his transition from motorcross to bass tournaments & provides tips on fishing in the fall. We answer a question on finding bass in creeks & give away a DVD set.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 124 -  Gary Klein
episodes.description: Co-host Steve Brigman returns from fishing ponds in Texas at the home of Mr. Pond Boss himself Bob Lusk. B.A.S.S. Angler and competitor for angler of the year Gary Klein discusses his love of fishing. We answer a question about tournament pre-fishing.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 123 - Randy Blaukat & Lloyd Walker
episodes.description: Host Aaron Martin offers tips on fall turnover fishing. FLW Angler Randy Blaukat visits The Edge with information on developing a pattern. We answer a listener question on fishing river systems. Lloyd Walker of Xcite Baits explains the power shaky head.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 122 - Shaw Grigsby
episodes.description: Veteran angler Shaw Grigsby visits The Edge with tips on becoming a pro angler, targeting smallmouth bass, and his top 5 baits. Hosts Aaron Martin and Steve Brigman talk about late summer to fall transitions.  We answer a question on fighting fish.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 121 - Rick Loomis
episodes.description: Hosts Aaron Martin and Steve Brigman talk about fishing ponds in Oklahoma. Lake Fork guide and expert Rick Loomis is back to discuss big bass and night fishing.  We answer a listener question regarding fishing lakes with dams.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 120 - Greg Hackney & Jay McNamara
episodes.description: 2009 FLW Champion Greg Hackney visits with The Edge crew to cover the techniques he used to find success.  Hosts Aaron and Steve discuss tough summer fishing and versatility. Dr. Jay McNamara applies Hackney's advice & success to non-tournament anglers.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 119 - Brian Snowden & Matt Paino
episodes.description: Hosts Aaron & Steve discuss fishing Lake Fork & Table Rock over the past week. Elite angler Brian Snowden returns with suggestions on practicing to improve your fishing skills. We answer a frog question. Matt Paino of Optimum Baits covers swimbaits.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 118 - Casey Ashley & Jake Davis
episodes.description: Aaron Martin is joined this week by fill in cohost Kurt Dove while Steve is out on assignment.  Elite Angler Casey Ashley visits to discuss fishing a jig.  Jake Davis with Secret Weapon Lures tells us about their new approach to drop shotting.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 117 - Recorded Live at ICast 2009
episodes.description: The Edge crew travels to Orlando Florida for ICast 2009 to speak with some industry greats at the WFN booth. Hosts Aaron Martin & Steve Brigman interview Sammy Lee, Mike Iaconelli, Dave Wolak, Aaron Martens, Mike McClelland, Bobby Lane, and Ish Monroe.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 116 - Clark Reehm & Mike Webb
episodes.description: B.A.S.S. Elite Angler Clark Reehm talks about finesse fishing with hard baits.  Mike Webb is back with more electronics tips. Hosts Aaron & Steve discuss their short list of summer go to baits. We answer a question regarding non-boaters in tournaments.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 115 - Pete Gluszek & Kurt Dove
episodes.description: This week's show is all about fishing ledges. FLW Pro Pete Gluszek covers ledge fishing with a football jig then Kurt Dove discusses finesse fishing ledges.  We answer a listener question on fishing logs and giveaway some prizes.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 114 - Mark Zona & Bob Lusk
episodes.description: Hosts Aaron Martin & Steve Brigman discuss weekend fishing and broken bones. We talk smallmouths with tournament angler and ESPN host Mark Zona. We answer a listener sunscreen question. Fisheries Biologist Bob Lusk return to discuss matching the hatch.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 113 - Tom Mann Jr & Listener Questions
episodes.description: Aaron Martin finds success with his modified Carolina Rig testing. BASS and FLW veteran Tom Mann Jr offers tips on targeting spotted bass. Aaron & Steve Brigman set aside The Inside Edge segment this week to catch up on several listener e-mail questions.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 112 - Clark Wendlandt & Jay McNamara
episodes.description: Aaron Martin & Steve Brigman discuss Carolina Rigs. FLW veteran pro Clark Wendlandt talks about versatility in fishing. We answer a listener question on hook sets. Performance Psychologist Dr. Jay McNamara looks at properly managing expectations.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge -  Episode 111 - George Cochran & Bob Lusk
episodes.description: Hosts Aaron Martin & Steve Brigman discuss night fishing. Bass fishing hall of fame member George Cochran visits to look at changes in fishing  & post spawn tactics. Pond Boss Bob Lusk returns to cover aquatic plants. We give away a Go To Tackle System.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 110 - David Fritts & Major Cody Roberson
episodes.description: Hosts Aaron Martin & Steve Brigman discuss Memorial Day plans and matching the brim. Angling Pro David Fritts talks crankbait fishing. Major Cody Roberson fills us in on the latest news from Army Bass Anglers. We answer a flouro vs braid line question.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 109 - Jim Tutt and Steve Shasserre
episodes.description: Hosts Aaron Martin & Steve Brigman discuss lures from years past. FLW Pro Jim Tutt offers fishing suggestions for May. Steve from Superstart Batteries returns with spring time battery advice. We answer a listener boat question and giveaway an Ardent kit.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 108 - Andre Moore & John McCurdy
episodes.description: Hosts Aaron Martin & Steve Brigman talk river fishing. Two time FLW Champ Andre Moore provides thoughts on changing weather conditions.  John McCurdy covers flipping & pitching during changing weather. We answer a listener question on back reeling.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 107 - Chad Morgenthaler & CBAA
episodes.description: FLW Angler Chad Morgenthaler joins the edge to cover spawn and post-spawn periods. Aaron and Steve discuss buying a boat. Troy Heckaman provides listeners an update on everything new with the CBAA. We answer a listener question on good spring lures.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 106 - Guido Hibdon & Ardent Reels
episodes.description: Legendary pro angler Guido Hibdon & wife Stella discuss angling life from both sides of the relationship. Jake Tippee from Ardent Reels offers insight on gear ratios. FLW Pro Chad Morgenthaler answers a listener question. Aaron & Steve talk shore fishing.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 105 - Terry Baksay & Santone Lures
episodes.description: Hosts Aaron Martin and Steve Brigman discuss spring spawning. FLW Angler Terry Baksay looks at clear water techniques. Ronnie Bickham from Santone Lures provides tips on jigs and spinnerbaits. Bob Lusk answers a question on spawning fish behavior.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 104 - Michael Murphy & Mark Tucker
episodes.description: FLW Angler and fisheries biologist Michael Murphy visits with Edge listeners to discuss the science of  fishing. Mark Tucker returns with tips on handling changing weather conditions. Aaron looks at fishing bluff pockets. Braided line questions answered.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 103 - Dion Hibdon & Bass East
episodes.description: FLW Angler Dion Hibdon visits with The Edge to discuss cold fronts and their effect on the fish. Ricky Bodsford introduces Edge listeners to Bass East. We answer a listener question on bait choice under various conditions and give away some DVDs.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 102 - Kurt Dove & Mark Tucker
episodes.description: BASS Elite Angler Kurt Dove and host Aaron Martin provide detailed information on their day fishing in Minnesota.  We answer a question on right hand versus left hand reels. Elite Angler Mark Tucker returns to talk about adjustments that pay off big.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 101 - Scott Suggs & Jay McNamara
episodes.description: FLW Champion Scott Suggs joins us to discuss his fishing trip with Aaron at Lake Caddo.  Dr. Jay McNamara takes a look at good decision making. We announce our big 100th podcast give away winner and answer a question on how to become a pro angler.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 100 - Pam Martin-Wells & Mark Tucker
episodes.description: The Edge celebrates show 100 with a special give away announcement.  WBT Angler Pam Martin Wells and Aaron discuss fishing St. Johns River in Florida. Mark Tucker lists his 5 go-to baits. Aaron and Steve reflect on the first 100 episodes & spring fishing.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 99 - Jared Lintner & Chris Ball
episodes.description: We're back in California in force this week as Elite pro Jared Lintner and Aaron tackle the Delta in a hunt for big bass among the tides. Chris Ball shares more frog fishing techniques. We announce our biggest give away ever for podcast only listeners!

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 98 - Dave Wolak & Bob Lusk
episodes.description: Expanding on this week's television show B.A.S.S. Elite Angler Dave Wolak and host Aaron Martin head east to Lake Murray in South Carolina.  Fisheries Biologist Bob Lusk returns to explain the 80/20 rule in detail. Aaron and Steve give away some prizes.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 97 - Randy Howell & Pete Ponds
episodes.description: Elite Angler Randy Howell and host Aaron Martin fish Logan Martin Lake in Alabama on this weeks television show and provide in depth detail here on The Edge.  Pro Pete Ponds is back with plenty of river fishing tips. We answer a reel and rod question.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 96 - Jamie Cyphers & Pete Ponds
episodes.description: Bass Edge returns to California as pro Jamie Cyphers and host Aaron Martin fish beautiful Clear Lake and discuss details for this weeks television show. Elite Pro Pete Ponds covers crankbaits. We giveaway a prize and answer a knot and swivel question.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 95 - Boyd Duckett & Mike Webb
episodes.description: 2007 Bassmaster Classic Champion Boyd Duckett and host Aaron Martin discuss in detail their fishing day on Lake Martin in Alabama. Mike Webb expands on his segment in this weeks TV show with sonar tips. Aaron & Steve cover their top 10 lures for Florida.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 94 - Sean Hoernke & Mark Tucker
episodes.description: FLW Angler Sean Hoernke returns to The Edge to provide in depth information on fishing Sam Rayburn for this weeks television show.  Mark Tucker goes into detail on matching weights to the cover you're fishing.  Boyd Duckett answers a listener question.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 93 - Jonathon VanDam & Bob Lusk
episodes.description: Collegiate Angler Jonathon VanDam speaks with Aaron about their day fishing Lake Vermilion for the latest episode of our television show. Bob Lusk covers how to recognize different types of strikes. We answer listener questions and give away goodies.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 92 - Chris Ball & Jamie Cyphers
episodes.description: Bass Edge heads to California this week as frog expert Chris Ball joins Aaron to discuss their time fishing the California Delta.  Then Western Pro Jamie Cyphers talks swimbaits. We answer listener questions and give away cool prizes.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 91 - Denny Brauer & Jay McNamara
episodes.description: Elite Angler and industry legend Denny Brauer is back to provide detail on his and Aaron's experience fishing the Cajun Coast for this week's television show on The Outdoor Channel. Dr. McNamara expands on his tv segment with advice on attitude and focus.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 90 - James Niggemeyer & Travis Rulle
episodes.description: Hosts Aaron and Steve return to start 2009 off with a show that ties directly in to this weeks television show on The Outdoor Channel.  Elite Angler James Niggemeyer goes into detail on fishing Lake Patoka in Indiana. Travis Rulle discusses fishing docks.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 89 - The Best of 2008
episodes.description: Hosts Aaron and Steve provide their list of the best moments and tips presented on the podcast over the past year.  We interview Major Cody Roberson direct from Iraq with holiday greetings for all.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 88 - Billy McCaghren & David Shumway
episodes.description: Aaron and Steve discuss the upcoming holiday season.  New BASS Elite series angler Billy McCaghren covers pitching, flipping and several other topics. Megaware Keelguard's David Shumway is back with information on their great new product, the Flex Step.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 87 - Mike Iaconelli & Jay McNamara
episodes.description: Dan Young is back from hunting to talk jerkbait fishing with Aaron.  Bassmaster Classic Champion Mike Iaconelli discusses momentum in your fishing and preparation.  Dr. Fish, Jay McNamara, returns to add to Mike's comments from a psychology perspective.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 86 - Boyd Duckett & Jamie Cyphers
episodes.description: Steve and Aaron discuss Thanksgiving. B.A.S.S. Elite Angler Boyd Duckett provides tips on fall fishing. Bass West Editor and Bass Edge regular Jamie Cyphers discusses their magazine and western fishing. We give away a prize and answer listener questions.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 85 - Pam Martin Wells & Steve Brigman
episodes.description: Aaron and Steve discuss fishing in Florida and Alabama for season 3 of the TV show.  WBT Champ Pam Martin Wells is back with husband Steve to cover how they approach a fishing day. Outdoor Writer Steve Brigman on his 40+ years of experience in the field.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 84 - Kurt Dove, Bill Lortz & Mark Jones
episodes.description: Aaron Martin joins Kurt Dove and Bill Lortz to discuss how they prepare for tournaments and tips for learning the most you can when in a co-angler position. Then Mark Jones from Big Bass Tours visits with The Edge with insight on hourly bass tournaments.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 83 - Aaron Martens & Bob Lusk
episodes.description: The two Aaron's finally meet!  Bass Edge host Aaron Martin interviews BASS Elite Pro Aaron Martens covering tips for catching bass under any condition.  Bob Lusk is back with advice on fish care after the catch.  We answer a question about electronics.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 82 - Dave Wolak &  Lowrance Electronics
episodes.description: Aaron and Dan make a big announcement for Bass Edge. BASS Elite Pro Dave Wolak discusses how he prepares to fish a body of water. Larry Byrd from Lowrance Electronics provides some great tips on using your electronics. We give away a Season 2 DVD set.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 81 - Tim Horton & Troy Heckaman
episodes.description: Aaron and Dan discuss "Project Hookup" and Bass Edge in Vegas. BASS Elite Angler Tim Horton discusses fishing patterns versus spots. Troy Heckaman brings us up to speed on what's new with the CBAA.  We answer a listener question on fishing from the shore.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 80 - Skeet Reese & Bob Lusk
episodes.description: BASS Elite Angler Skeet Reese discusses his background, mental toughness and consistency. Fisheries biologist Bob Lusk is back discussing boat electronics and their impact on fish. Pete Ponds answers a listener question with river fishing tips.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 79 - Stacey King & Mark Jeffries
episodes.description: Hosts Aaron and Dan discuss fall angling.  Fishing legend Stacey King discusses patterns and techniques for the fall transition. Bass Zone founder Mark Jeffries discusses the mission and hard work behind basszone.com. We answer a listener question.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 78 - Rick Clunn & Bob Lusk
episodes.description: We speak with the "Dean" of bass fishing, Rick Clunn, about fall fishing and the mathematics of shallow angling. Bob Lusk is back to elaborate on fall transitions. Kurt Dove answers a listener question on rigging a 4" gobie. We give away a prizes.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 77 - Mark Tucker & Major Cody Roberson
episodes.description: Hosts Aaron and Dan talk about fall fish activity. B.A.S.S. Elite Angler Mark Tucker joins us to talk about staying fit and provides pointers on jigs. Major Cody Roberson provides us with another update from the field in Iraq.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 76 - Jared Lintner & Bob Lusk
episodes.description: B.A.S.S. Elite Angler Jared Lintner joins us from California to discuss his background, adapting on Lake Guntersville, and the mental side of fishing.  Fisheries Biologist Bob Lusk returns to discuss hurricane Ike and how large storms impact fisheries.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 75 - Dion Hibdon & Jay McNamara
episodes.description: Fishing legend Dion Hibdon visits The Edge to discuss fishing with his dad, entering the sport, fishing at a slow pace, and more. Sports Psychologist Jay Mcnamara returns to compare the Olympics to fishing.  We answer a listener question about worm speed.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 74 - Steve Kennedy & American Eagle Rods
episodes.description: B.A.S.S. and FLW angler Steve Kennedy tells us how he got his start in professional fishing and shares his thoughts on the sport. Drew Patterson from American Eagle Rods provides tips on rod selection. We answer a listener question on fishing the Potomac.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 73 - Davey Hite & Jim Ferguson
episodes.description: B.A.S.S. Elite Angler Davey Hite discusses fishing personality and figuring out a body of water. Then we talk with Jim Ferguson host of Great American Outdoor Trails Radio Magazine.  Elite Pro James Niggemeyer answers a question on hook set technique.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 72 - Pete Ponds & Jake Tippee
episodes.description: B.A.S.S. Elite Angler Pete Ponds is back on The Edge to discuss top techniques for this time of year including rigs, locations, and terminal tackle. Jake Tippee from Ardent covers their new flipping reel and Smart Cull Professional Culling System.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 71 - John VanDam & Bob Lusk
episodes.description: Aaron & Dan discuss fall angling.  CBAA Angler John VanDam talks about the CBAA organization and provides plenty of smallmouth bass fishing tips.  Fisheries Biologist Bob Lusk returns with tips on fishing smaller waters like ponds and community lakes.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 70 - Jerry Green & Troy Heckaman
episodes.description: FLW Pro Jerry Green joins The Edge this week to discuss versatility on the water.  CBAA head Troy Heckaman provides another update on what's happening in the world of collegiate angling. We answer a listener question regarding good lures for pond fishing.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 69 - Kim Bain & Bob Lusk
episodes.description: Hosts Aaron & Dan talk smallmouth fishing & fishing frogs in Minnesota. WBT Pro Kim Bain covers her history, the WBT, and flipping the sweet beaver creature bait. Fisheries Biologist Bob Lusk looks at fishing in the heat of summer. We answer questions.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 68 - Randy Howell & Mac Archer
episodes.description: B.A.S.S. Elite Angler Randy Howell visits The Edge to discuss techniques he used in his recent third place finish at Old Hickory. Mercury Marine's Mac Archer provides mid-season tips for maintaining your boat motor and ways to cut down on fuel use.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 67 - Bill McDonald & Bob Lusk
episodes.description: Hosts Aaron and Dan discuss beating the heat by fishing at night. Bill McDonald returns with plenty of general tips about fishing shallow and tackling the Ohio River. Fisheries Biologist Bob Lusk answers questions on fishing high water.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 66 - Guido Hibdon &  Jay McNamara
episodes.description: Host Dan Young celebrates his 1-year anniversary with Bass Edge. Veteran and Classic Champ Guido Hibdon provides tips and techniques for fishing docks. Dr. Jay McNamara is back to discuss uncontrollable variables in fishing. We answer listener questions.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 65 - Jimmy Mason & Major Cody Roberson
episodes.description: FLW Pro Jimmy Mason provides his tips on deep cranking including locations, lures, & techniques. For a special July 4th weekend treat Major Cody Roberson returns with an interview direct from Iraq discussing his duties and fishing opportunities there.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 64 - Larry Nixon & Mike Webb
episodes.description: FLW Pro Larry Nixon joins us to talk about fishing with plastic worms, line choice, sinkers, and more. Bass Edge Pro Staffer Mike Webb returns with more information on deep fishing and electronics use. Hosts Aaron and Dan answer a listener question.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 63 - Denny Brauer & Troy Heckaman
episodes.description: Hosts Aaron and Dan attempt to explain what a widget is.  B.A.S.S. Elite Pro and industry legend Denny Brauer joins us to discuss how he prepares and presents a jig. CBAA head Troy Heckaman return to give the latest info on collegiate angling.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 62 - Sean Hoernke & Bob Lusk
episodes.description: Aaron speaks with FLW Angler Sean Hoernke about his recent win at Lake Norman and tips on how to get into the sport of bass fishing. Fisheries Biologist Bob Lusk returns to talk to us about night fishing. A Season 1 DVD is given away to a listener.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 61 - Chris Ball & Kurt Dove
episodes.description: Western angler Chris Ball and Aaron discuss river fishing, adjusting to the changing weather conditions, and ways to target bigger fish. Kurt Dove returns to discuss how he selects a hook.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 60 - Fred Roumbanis & Bob Lusk
episodes.description: Hosts Aaron & Dan look at fishing out of smaller water craft. B.A.S.S. Elite Angler Fred Roumbanis dicusses his recent win at Lake Murray. Fisheries Biologist Bob Lusk discussed summer patterns. Aaron answers a listener question on reel cleaning.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 59 - Pam Bolton & Kurt Dove
episodes.description: Aaron and Dan talk topwater baits.  FLW angler Pam Bolton fills us in on tips when fishing as a co-angler and keeping stride with family, her company, and a pro angler husband. B.A.S.S. Elite Angler Kurt Dove goes into more detail on fishing topwater.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 58 - Roy Hawk & Jay McNamara
episodes.description: Hosts Aaron & Dan discuss post spawn tactics.  FLW Western, Stren, and Bass West Competitor Roy Hawk joins us to discuss catching bass out west.  Listener questions are answered. Jay "Dr. Fish" McNamara on the importance of changing with your conditions.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 57 - Rick Loomis & Steve Shasserre
episodes.description: Rick Loomis discusses how to best locate fish in changing weather conditions.  Steve Shasserre of SuperStart Batteries clarifies the difference between cold cranking amps and marine cranking amps and what is needed for your cranking battery.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 56 - James Niggemeyer & Troy Heckaman
episodes.description: After some technical difficulties, hosts Aaron and Dan return a few days later than usual to discuss sight fishing with B.A.S.S. Elite Pro James Niggemeyer.  CBAA director Troy Heckaman is back with the latest information on the collegiate angling scene.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 55 - Scott Suggs & Bob Lusk
episodes.description: 2008 FLW Champion Scott Suggs joins us to discuss what it's like to win a million dollars and how he prepares for each tournament.  Pond Boss Editor and Fisheries Biologist Bob Lusk returns to answer a variety of questions on bass size and growth.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 54 - Mike Cork & Major Cody Roberson
episodes.description: Aaron and Steve discuss the upcoming Bamajam festival in Alabama and spring fishing.  We then head to Caddo Lake to take a look at fishing cypress trees with Mike Cork.  Major Cody Roberson fills us in on the Army Bass Anglers organization.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 53 - Mike Brooks & Blake Muhlenbruck
episodes.description: Aaron joins Ardent president and CEO Mike Brooks as they cover our most asked question - what do sponsors look for when selecting their pro staff?  We also talk with Naked Bait Company about their skirt expander tool. A listener question is answered.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 52 - Mike Webb & Jay McNamara
episodes.description: We cover one of our most asked about topics, fishing from the shore, with plenty of tips from Bass Edge Pro Staff members Mike Webb and Dr. Jay McNamara. Elite Angler Pete Ponds answers a listener question related to line choice.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 51 - Cindy Hill & Bob Lusk
episodes.description: Expanding this weeks TV show, Aaron and WBT Competitor Cindy Hill discuss fishing ledges at Kentucky Lake. Bob Lusk, Fisheries Biologist and editor of Pond Boss Magazine talks pond construction and management. Aaron & Dan talk targeting spawning bass.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 50 - Terry Bolton and Mike Webb
episodes.description: Hosts Aaron and Dan discuss picking out a trolling motor.  FLW Pro Terry Bolton covers searching for bass on Clark's Hill under changing conditions. Inside Edge gets a CBAA update from Troy Heckaman. We answer listener questions.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 49 - Travis Rulle & Mike Webb
episodes.description: Aaron and Dan talk about consistency on the water.  FLW Pro Angler Travis Rulle joins The Edge crew to look at fishing a jig on Table Rock Lake.  Randy Qualls from Legend Boats discusses features you should take a look at when shopping for a bass boat.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 48 - Dave Wolak & David Shumway
episodes.description: B.A.S.S. Elite Angler Dave Wolak joins Aaron and Dan to expand on his day tracking down bass on the Chattahoochee River.  David Shumway, president of Megaware Keelguard, discusses their SkegPro product - what it does and how to install it.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 47 - Pete Ponds & James Niggemeyer
episodes.description: Hosts Aaron and Dan talk swimbaits and boat shows.  Pete Ponds returns to discuss his approach for locating bass on Choke Canyon in Texas. James Niggemeyer provides insight on choosing and using soft plastics.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 45 - Brian Snowden & James Niggemeyer
episodes.description: Brian Snowden joins The Edge to discuss techniques he and Aaron used to find smallmouth bass during their day of fishing on Bull Shoals.  James Niggemeyer goes in depth on his Inside Edge segment on this weeks TV show discussing jig selection and use.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 44 - Alton Jones & James Niggemeyer
episodes.description: Host's Aaron and Dan are joined by BASS Elite Angler Alton Jones as they go into detail on Aaron and Alton's day of fishing at Choke Canyon.  James Niggemeyer returns to go more in depth on this week's Inside Edge topic - thermocline.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 43 - Pam Martin-Wells & James Niggemeyer
episodes.description: Aaron and Dan cover items to keep an eye out for during boat show season. WBT Champion Pam Martin-Wells discusses techniques for fishing on Percy Priest lake last fall.  B.A.S.S. Elite Angler James Niggemeyer provides pointers for choosing crank baits.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 42 - Sean Hoernke & Troy Heckaman
episodes.description: FLW Pro Sean Hoernke shares his knowledge on fishing large bodies of water as they expand on this weeks tv show on Lake Erie.  Troy Heckaman with the CBAA discusses their mission to bring bass fishing and outdoor education to the college level.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 41 - Boyd Duckett & James Niggemeyer
episodes.description: Bassmaster Classic Champion Boyd Duckett expands the topic of fishing frogs on Eufala as featured in the latest episode of our TV show. Also tying into this week's television show, James Niggemeyer provides more information on selecting spinnerbaits.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 40 - Kurt Dove
episodes.description: B.A.S.S. Elite Pro Kurt Dove joins Aaron and Dan to discuss tidal water fishing on the Potomac River. Also B.A.S.S. Elite Pro  James Niggemeyer joins Aaron to talk about sight fishing tips and techniques.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 39 - Pete Ponds & Ardent
episodes.description: B.A.S.S. Elite Pro Angler Pete Ponds returns to discuss fishing on Lake Amistad.  Jake Tippee of Ardent discusses choosing a reel that's right for you.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 38 - Mike Webb and The Best of 2007!
episodes.description: Mike Webb joins our last episode of 2007 to discuss winter fishing and the importance of electronics.  We answer listener e-mail questions.  Hosts Aaron and Dan then look back at their favorite moments of 2007 on The Edge.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 37 - Jamie Fralick and Terry Brown
episodes.description: Hosts Aaron and Dan go over last minute Christmas gift ideas for the angler.  B.A.S.S. Elite Angler Jamie Fralick discusses what to look for when fishing in winter.  BassFan guru, Terry Brown, overviews the passion and work that goes into bassfan.com.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 36 - Jay McNamara
episodes.description: Dr. Fish, Jay McNamara, returns to discuss mental exercises for the off season to help catch more fish in 2008.  Aaron and Dan review other options to keep busy during the winter months.  Ken Whiting from E-21 talks rod construction and selection.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 35 - David Wolak
episodes.description: Hosts Dan Young and Aaron Martin discuss top baits for fall and winter.  B.A.S.S. Elite Pro Dave Wolak provides tips on line choice.  Also, Mike Huppert, head of research and development for FinTech Tackle overviews their innovative line of jigs.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 34 - Luke Clausen
episodes.description: FLW Cup Champion and Bassmaster Classic Champion Luke Clausen talks about using a shaky head in all types of water. Lionel Hollingsworth of Tru Trac Lures discusses bait design. The guys also discuss the challenges and dangers of fishing low water.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 33 - Pam Martin Wells
episodes.description: 2007 Women's Bass Tour Classic Champion, Pam Martin Wells, share tips on site fishing in the fall. Aaron and Steve also discuss the way lake currents affect the movements of fish. Professional angler Emily Shaffer joins Steve to discuss women in fishing.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 32 - Jamie Cyphers
episodes.description: Pro Angler Jamie Cyphers joins the guys to discuss the US Open of Bass Fishing and fishing out west. Also Mark Klossner of Mercury Motors discusses tips for motor maintenance along with changes and improvements in outboard motor technology.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 31 - Rick Clunn
episodes.description: Fishing Legend, Rick Clunn sits down with Bass Edge Editor Steve Brigman to discuss confidence and the importance of mental strength. Lee Bailey Jr. stops by to discuss the all new proanglers.com and how it helps new anglers.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 30 - Terry Bolton
episodes.description: FLW Angler Terry Bolton discusses fishing structure in shallow and deep waters across the country. Craig Lamb of the Professional Anglers Association joins us to discuss the growth of the PAA and the upcoming 2008 PAA Toyota Texas Bass Classic.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 29 - Ken Brodeur
episodes.description: B.A.S.S. Elite Angler Ken Brodeur returns with information on bass movement with temperature transitions, baits to use, and more. Brian Hemsley from G-Loomis Rods discusses features to look for when shopping for your next rod.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 28 - Andy Morgan
episodes.description: FLW Angler Andy Morgan discusses flipping and pitching, go-to baits, and diversity on the water.  We give away a Keelguard valued at over $150.  Tim Bankston from Anglers Advantage Insurance provides advice on insuring your boat and equipment.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 27 - Boyd Duckett
episodes.description: Reigning BassMasters Classic Champion Boyd Duckett joins us to discuss making good mental decisions, flipping big weights, and fishing grass. Dr. Jay McNamara, author and In The Zone host, talks about confidence and making a list of your strengths.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 26 - Alton Jones
episodes.description: Hosts Dan and Aaron are joined by B.A.S.S. Elite Competitor Alton Jones to discuss the adventures and obstacles of fishing the backs of creeks. Also Keith Nesmith of Vicious talks about various line properties and how to choose the right type of line.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 25 - Brian Snowden
episodes.description: B.A.S.S. Elite Angler Brian Snowden and Aaron talk about changes in patterns heading into September. Aaron and Steve discuss small rivers and the challenge of summertime fishing.  Also Steve wraps up his manufacturer interview series from iCast.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 24 - Rick Loomis
episodes.description: Aaron lists off his top 10 go-to baits.  Noted Lake Fork guide Rick Loomis discusses night fishing and utilizing the shady side of the moon. We give away some Mother's Wax products. Steve presents another round of manufacturer interviews from iCast.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 23 - Kurt Dove
episodes.description: B.A.S.S. Elite Pro and tidal water expert Kurt Dove joins Dan and Aaron to discuss the spawning patterns and movements of bass at the Potomac River in Virginia. Steve Brigmann is back with some exciting manufacturer interviews from iCast.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 22 - Bill McDonald
episodes.description: Aaron and Dan speak with Stren Series Competitor Bill McDonald about factors of summer time fishing. Aaron talks about the FLW Cup. Also Bass Edge's Publishing Editor Steve Brigman joins the guys to talk about where he feels the industry is headed.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 21 - Sean Hoernke
episodes.description: FLW Competitor and host of Field and Stream's Total Outdoor Competition, Sean Hoernke joins us in our Angler Spotlight. Troy Heckaman with the Collegiate Bass Anglers Association discusses bringing competitive bass angling to the college level.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 20 - Cindy Hill
episodes.description:
Introduction:
Hosts Aaron Martin and Dan Young discuss the versatility of spinnerbait, the FLW tour, and the loss of outdoor writer and friend Tim Tucker.

Angler Spotlight:
B.A.S.S. Pro Angler Cindy Hill talks about the Woman's Bass Tour, getting females and children involved, fishing ledges, and much more.

Product Give Away and Listener Question:
This week on our product give away, a lucky winner get a full line up of Mother's Cleaning products to help keep the truck and boat in perfect condition.  Aaron and Dan discuss night fishing during our listener question and answer segment.

The Inside Edge:
Steve Gordon with Renaissance Financial provides pointers for managing your money off the water so you can spend more time on the water.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 19 - Steve Clapper
episodes.description:
Hosts Aaron Martin and Outdoors Dan interview FLW Pro Angler Steve Clapper on techniques to use when tackling Lake Erie including handling the weather, bait and line choices, and rigging our boat properly for the often difficult conditions.

During this weeks product give-away, a lucky listener receives a reel cleaning kit from Ardent Reels.

In our product focus, Legend Boats discusses their two new lines of bass boats introduced this year, the background and people behind Legend, and some of the things that make Legend one of the fastest growing boat companies in the world.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 18 - Joe Mitchell
episodes.description: Joe Mitchell discusses fishing the Red River including tackling the mud, current, bait selection, and more.  Jake Tippee with Ardent Reels discusses reel selection, their new products introduced at iCast, and their popular Reel Butter product.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 17 - Lisa Craig
episodes.description: WBT Pro Lisa Craig lends a female perspective on competitive angling including information on the women's bass tour, getting started, preparation, gear, techniques, and more. Dr. Jay McNamara wraps up part 2 of his interview on time management.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 16 - Peter Thliveros
episodes.description: All time great Peter T discusses his background, finding a pattern, tournaments and more during a break in his tournament schedule last fall. We give away a Cooks Tackle System. Dr. Jay McNamara, in part 1 of a 2 part interview, discusses goal setting.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 15 - Jeff Reynolds
episodes.description: B.A.S.S Pro and competitive roper Jeff Reynolds discusses a variety of techniques he uses to locate fish and managing both angling and roping circuits.  We speak with Fred Ulrich, one of the top catch-and-release operators in the nation.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 14 - Jason Quinn
episodes.description: Pro Jason Quinn discusses his background, tips to introduce kids to the sport, and keys to his success.  We give away a $160 Keeluard! JR Isom, winner of the Ranger Tournament on Table Rock breaks down his tournament preparation and day.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 13 - Kenyon Hill
episodes.description: We catch up with B.A.S.S. Elite Angler Kenyon Hill on juggling the demands of a professional angler, establishing a pattern, crankbaits, line choice, and more.  Matt Mulden with Solarbat discusses what to look for in eye protection on the water.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 12 - Ken Brodeur
episodes.description: B.A.S.S. Elite Angler Ken Brodeur talks about switching from saltwater fishing to freshwater and techniques he has brought along the way.  Rich Dalby of Ads-On-The-Go discusses the popularity of boat wraps and the processes involved with a wrap.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 11 - Mark Tucker
episodes.description: B.A.S.S. Elite Angler Mark Tucker joins us to discusses a variety of topics including how he approaches a multitude of lakes, keeping fit, and the future of the sport. David Petty from Bayou Outdoors explains their V&M line of baits.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 10 - David Johnson
episodes.description:
Aaron provides his thoughts on the recent PAA event at Lake Fork in Texas.

We cover techniques for success using lipless crankbaits with 25-year tournament veteran David Johnson.

Product give away and question/answer session.

Sure Life Laboratories discusses fish care in live wells and why some live well additive products may be doing fish more harm than good.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 9 - Hackney, Seagraves, Lane
episodes.description: Elite anglers Greg Hackney, Terry Seagraves, and Chris Lane share some of their favorite techniques.  Also, Adam Heindorf, V.P. of Sales for Megaware Keelguard, discusses the SkegPro product.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 8 - David Kirkland
episodes.description: David Kirkland joins us to discuss techniques for catching bass with a Carolina Rig. We give away some great products to a listener.  Jay McNamara PhD. LP talks about his new book - The Psychology of Exceptional Fishing.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 7 - James Niggemeyer
episodes.description: B.A.S.S. Elite Pro Angler James Niggemeyer provides insights on his techniques when fishing shallow.  We give away a B&W Trailer Hitch, valued at $150, to a lucky winner.  Scott Marsh, Director of Marketing for B&W Trailer Hitches, discusses their companies history and innovative products.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 6 - Roger Brown
episodes.description: Aaron interviews "Bass Coach" Roger Brown on his techniques for grass fishing.  Also, David Shumway from Keelguard joins us to talk about their entire line of boat protection products.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 5 - Mike Webb
episodes.description: Deep water, drop shot, and electronics expert Mike Webb tells us all about his techniques and gear.  There is plenty of in depth knowledge on how to properly use your electronics, things to look for when shopping for electronics, spots to look for when fishing deep, and the bait, line, and rods Mike goes to the most for success.   We also give away our next prize package to a lucky winner.  Darrel Cook founder of Cook's Tackle Systems discusses the advantages of the Cook's Go To Tackle System.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 4 - David Strahan
episodes.description: This week we interview noted big fish expert and Lake Fork Texas guide David Strahan.  He discusses locating fish on Lake Fork and things to keep in mind when selecting a guide on any lake.  Also, we select this week's prize winner for a Keelguard prize package.  In our product in-depth segment, Steve Shasserre from Eastpenn Deka Manufacturing, one of the largest battery manufacturing companies in the world, discusses how to properly maintain and select a marine battery for your boat.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 3 - Kurt Dove
episodes.description: B.A.S.S. Elite Pro Angler Kurt Dove joins us for tips on fishing tidal waters. In our in-depth product segment Craig Burnett, lead chemist for Mother's Wax, discusses ways to keep your boat in shape and environmental factors that can effect your boat from lake to lake. Plus, the first drawing for our give away!

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 2 - Edwin Evers
episodes.description: We interview Edwin Evers for tips on tournaments, sponsorships, and establishing a pattern.  We also speak with with Heartland Trails for information on finding and competing in local tournaments.

episodes.title: Bass Edge's The Edge - Episode 1 - Pete Ponds
episodes.description: We interview Pete Ponds who provides a wealth of information on fishing with crankbaits.  We also discuss boat security with Pete Benedetto from Loc-R-Bar.
